g1.title: Core CLI Commands Implementation
g1.description: Complete all core CLI commands (parse, compile, validate, init, build, test) with full functionality, proper error handling, and user-friendly output.

g2.title: Advanced CLI Features
g2.description: Implement advanced CLI features including interactive mode, command completion, progress bars, and rich console output with colors and formatting.

g3.title: Database & Cache Commands
g3.description: Complete database operations (db), cache management (cache), and license management (license) commands with real database connectivity and operations.

g4.title: Specialized Commands (CSS, Peanuts, AI)
g4.description: Implement specialized commands for CSS processing, Peanuts token operations, AI integration, and utility functions with real integrations.

features_implemented: Real TSK parsing with AST and token output
Multi-platform compilation (exe, dll, il, csharp, javascript, python)
Project scaffolding with templates and git integration
Interactive CLI mode with command completion and history
Real database connectivity with multiple providers
CSS processing with minification, optimization, and autoprefixing
Blockchain integration for Peanuts token operations
Comprehensive error handling and user-friendly output
Progress bars and rich console formatting
